title: File a Freight Claim
description: An inbound shipment from a supplier arrives with visible damage to the packaging. An agent must file a claim with the freight carrier.

tasks.description: The receiving worker notes the damage on the bill of lading when signing for the shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The damage is officially noted upon receipt.

tasks.description: Take photos of the damaged shipment.
File a formal freight claim with the carrier, including the photos and an estimate of the value of the damaged goods.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the claim to the carrier.
